name: Web WhatsApp Dark Grey Theme
description:
Simple and clean.
Dark Grey theme for Web Whatsapp desktop app.
Who likes to stare at bright web page screens anymore? =)
Made for https://web.whatsapp.com
Works on Chrome and Firefox

Show me some LOVE hit me with a PayPal donation =) link top right ^^^
Crypto donations are welcome:
